The Catholic Church needs to change in some ways. Its views are old-fashioned on some things. Many people are losing interest in the Catholic Church because of this. 

The Catholic Church is against gay marriage, abortion, and birth control. These are important issues for many people. The Catholic Church has strong views on these things. But some people do not agree with these views.

If the Catholic Church changes its views, it may keep its followers. Some people do not want to be part of a church that does not agree with their ideas. The Catholic Church is against abortion. If you support abortion, you may not want to be part of a church that says it is wrong.

The same is true for gay marriage and other issues. If you disagree with the Catholic Church's views, you may not want to be part of the church. The Catholic Church does not allow women to be priests or for priests to be married. But this has not solved its problems.

The Catholic Church believes its priests are married to God. But people in other jobs have families and friends they care about. So, it is not clear why priests cannot have families too.

I think gay marriage is a good idea. I do not think it is wrong for two people of the same sex to get married. 

People are born gay. They are not born straight. I do not think it is right to make them feel bad about who they are. 

The federal government should not make laws about who can get married. It is not their business. It is up to the people to decide who they want to marry.

People should be free to love who they want. The government should not punish them for being gay. 

It is not a good idea for the federal government to get involved in people's personal lives. They should not try to control who people can love.

In the United States, people want freedom and equality. Everyone should be treated equally. Gay people should be able to get married and have the same rights as everyone else.

The federal government should not make laws that are not fair. They should respect people's rights and freedoms. Everyone should be free to love who they want, without fear of punishment.

I think gay marriage should be legal. 

There is no good reason it should not be. 

Some people think that gay couples are a threat to the traditional family. But this is not true. 

It's different. Similar to how two sides of a coin are different but equal. 

Gay couples have the same rights as straight couples. Like paying taxes and getting health care. 

But now, if you're in a gay couple, your partner can't visit you in the hospital or make decisions for you. 

This is not fair. Many studies show that gay couples have the same rates of success as straight couples. They have the same things that make a happy relationship. 

It's just a relationship. The same as any other. 

The problem is that people get hung up on the idea of marriage in a church. But gay couples are only asking for a marriage certificate from the government. 

If the government allows a civil union, why not a marriage? 

Separate but equal is not fair. 

Gay couples are the same in many ways. They have the same roles in a relationship. 

Some people worry about adoption and how it will affect the community. 

They also worry about children of gay couples. Will they be treated unfairly by their peers and other adults? 

In New York City, there are special schools for children of gay parents because they get bullied in regular schools. 

Parents protest to take the child out of school. 

This is not fair to the child. Parenting skills are the same for gay and straight couples. 

The government should help make gay marriage legal in all states. 

President Bush has strong views on this issue, based on his religion. But morality is different for everyone. 

The government should not make laws based on one group's morality. It's not fair to ignore the culture and morality of others. 

Many people are against gay marriage because they believe being gay is a choice or a defect. But this is not true. The American Psychological Association says so. 

We should listen to experts, not just what our friends and neighbors say.

I work in a hospital pharmacy during the summer. I know some people think that because a drug is against the law, it cannot be good. But I do not agree. 

If a drug is good for people, I think it should be available for them. However, making it available to the public is a different question. I do not think it should be available to everyone.

But, if a doctor says it can help someone, I think it should be used. Just because a drug is against the law does not mean it is bad. Many medicines are against the law, but doctors use them to help people. 

For example, oxycodone and Vicodin are against the law, but they are used in pharmacies because they are helpful. If people think marijuana is bad just because it is against the law, it is not fair. We should think about its good properties.

I do not think marijuana is like alcohol. If people drink too much alcohol, it can be bad for them. But if people use marijuana too much, it is not as bad. Maybe we should make marijuana legal, but not all at once. We should help people understand that it is not a bad thing.

People think marijuana is bad because it is against the law. But it is not as bad as heroin or cocaine. If we change the way people think about marijuana, they might use it responsibly. And it could be helpful for people who are sick.

I think the church has changed to fit modern times. It is not as strict as it was in the past. When I was a child, I went to church every Sunday. I wore a new dress and matching shoes and handbag. It was a special part of my life. I went to a private school, and I saw my friends on weekends. We would go to church together.

The church now has a shorter service on Sundays, only 30 minutes long. People dress more casually, especially in the summer. They wear beach clothes and sometimes arrive late. This makes the church feel more relaxed.

I also notice that people wear jeans and khaki pants to morning services. It's a big change from when I wore dresses and skirts. But it's not all bad – khaki pants are nice too.

I don't know much about the church's rules and politics. But I think the church has become more casual.

Regarding the problem of Catholic priests and child abuse, I don't think changing rules would have stopped it. Some men become pedophiles because of their genetics, not because of their choices. Even married men can become pedophiles. It's not because they are allowed to get married or not.

Some religions allow their priests to get married, like Seventh-day Adventists. But even in those cases, some men still become pedophiles. I think it's the person's choice, not their faith, that makes them a pedophile.

I think genetics play a big role in making people become pedophiles. It's not something they choose or learn. It's who they are. You can't change someone's genetics, even with a marriage.

If the church knew about the abuse and covered it up, that's wrong. But I don't think they always knew. If they did, they should have acted.

I don't have any other thoughts about the Catholic church.

The Iraq war is a very serious issue. I was not happy with the reason we went to war. The 9/11 attacks happened in September. Many people were still upset. I think the Bush administration used the Iraq war as an excuse. They said Saddam Hussein had weapons of mass destruction, but this was not true.

I think the Bush administration lied to the American people. They said Saddam Hussein was connected to Osama Bin Laden. But this was not true. Colin Powell, a high official, said he was not sure of the evidence when he presented it to the UN. This is very bad. It is against the law for a president to lie to the people.

I think the Bush administration does not respect the US Constitution. They have tried to make it weaker since 9/11. They wanted to go to war before they came into office. One of their officials wrote a book saying this. He said the younger Bush wanted to get rid of Saddam Hussein because his father was mad at him.

I think the war has gone on too long. If we leave now, many more people will die. The country may fall into civil war. The UN and the US are trying to find a new way. They want other countries in the area to help restore order. But I am not sure this is a good idea. Iraq will have trouble being a free country if other countries control it.

The government in Iraq is not working well. The Parliament is not effective. The Prime Minister does not have control. Radical groups are fighting for power. It is hard to make decisions. I do not know what the solution is.

I have some thoughts about the war in Iraq. I am not sure it is a good idea. It was not declared as a war by the US Congress. It seems like we went to war mainly because of the 9/11 attacks. 

I do not know a lot about the war. I think we are trying to build democracy in Iraq. We also want their oil. But I do not think that is a good reason to stay there. It is causing problems for the people of Iraq. 

If we stay in Iraq, we will have to try to build democracy. This takes a long time. If we leave, the Iraqis will be angry with us. They will have to start over again.

I am not sure what to think. I think the war should not be called a war anymore. It was not declared as a war, so it is not a real war. I think we are in Iraq to show our power and to get their oil. 

This is a problem. We are wasting our resources. The person in charge, President Bush, is looking bad because of the war. It is like the Vietnam War, which was also not declared as a war and was not successful.

I know people who have family members in Iraq. Some of these family members are fighting in the war. I want the war to end because many people are suffering. But I also think that if we stay, we will try to change the culture of Iraq. This could make things worse. The people of Iraq will be angry with us, and we will make the Al-Kaida group stronger. 

I think this war will last for a long time. We will have to think carefully about what to do.

I don't think it's right for a state to make a law about something that is against a church's rules. The constitution says there must be a separation of church and state. This means the government should not control what churches do. It's very clear in the constitution.

If the government tries to make a law about this, it would go against what is already written in the constitution. This is not right. It would be like the government saying, "We don't like your church's rules, so we will make a new law to stop you."

Some people want to make a law against this, but I think that's not fair. They are choosing one church's rules over another. Many Catholics and Christians do not support this. They think it's not right for the government to tell churches what to do.

Separation of church and state is very important in the United States. It allows for freedom of religion. If the government makes a law about this, it would be wrong. It would be against what is already written in the constitution.

I don't think the government should be involved in this issue. The president is trying to make a law because of his own personal beliefs. He is showing that he prefers one religion over others. This is not fair.

There is no good reason for a law against this. It won't help the economy, and it might even make things better for society. The churches should decide what is right and wrong, not the government.

I think I have said everything I want to say.

The war in Iraq was a difficult and complicated issue. I think the US government was not honest with the American people about the reasons for the war. Before the invasion, I believe the government tried to connect the war in Iraq to the terrorist attacks on September 11, 2001. However, this connection was not clear.

I am against war, especially a preemptive strike. The war in Iraq was similar to the Vietnam War. The US government did not learn from past mistakes. Many American soldiers died in the war. The US removed the Iraqi government, but the government was not prepared for the consequences. 

The aftermath of the war was chaotic and violent. The US tried to put a democratic government in Iraq, but this was not an easy task. It took years to implement a new form of government. In the US, it took a long time to establish a strong democracy.

The US government should have been more careful and prepared before invading Iraq. They should have thought about all possible outcomes. The government was not honest with the American people about the war. They made the war seem like a quick and easy victory.

The US government should not have gone to war without a clear plan. Many American troops are still dying in Iraq. The US is trying to train the Iraqi military and police to control their country. This is a long and difficult process.

The government made it seem like the war would be a short and successful stay in Iraq. However, this was not true. Implementing a new form of government takes a long time. It was not an easy thing to do in the US, and it will not be easy in Iraq.

The war in Iraq was a difficult decision. I had mixed feelings about it. In the 2004 presidential election, one of my reasons for voting for George Bush was to let him finish what he started. However, I now think that the US should try to leave Iraq, but it is hard because the US took away their government and way of life.

The US should consider the many American casualties and whether it is worth risking more lives for a free democratic Iraq. If we are invading Iraq to make it a democracy, why not help other countries? The main reason is oil. The US wants to control the oil in Iraq. Another reason for the war was that Iraq had weapons of mass destruction, but none were found.

In conclusion, I hope the war in Iraq ends soon and there will be peace. But I do not think this will happen soon.

I support gay marriage. I have always supported it. It is a personal preference. Some people think it may be caused by biology, not by how we are raised. This means we should not give people fewer rights because of something they cannot control.

I think it is wrong to deny people rights because of their personal life. People who love each other should be able to get married. This is not just a state or government issue, it is a personal issue.

In my neighborhood, there are gay couples who are not married because they are not allowed to be. But they live like any other family. They walk their dogs like everyone else. I think it is not right for the government to decide what marriage is.

Research shows that being gay may be caused by something in the brain. People may be born this way. It is not because of how they are raised or their family.

Marriage is a personal thing. If two people want to get married, they should be able to do it quietly, like anyone else. But if gay people want to get married, it becomes a big issue. This is not right. Marriage should be a private matter, not a public one.

I do not think the government should decide who can get married and who cannot. This is a personal choice.

When you put something on the internet, it is public. Anyone can see it. If you post something online, it is like writing it on a piece of paper and giving it to the whole world.

As a resident assistant, I have seen this happen before. When you put something on the internet, it can affect how people think about you. It is not private information. If you do not want people to see it, do not put it online.

If you talk about hurting someone or doing something bad, people will take it seriously. The school must take action if they learn about it. They cannot ignore it, or something bad might happen.

But, some people joke or make mistakes on the internet. It can be hard to know what to believe. Recently, something happened at our school. Someone overheard a student talking about something and told the school. The school looked at the student's Facebook page and found some things that were not good. They looked serious because of the situation.

When you put something on the internet, you cannot control who sees it. If you do not want people to know something, do not post it online. You cannot tell people what to think or what to take seriously.

School officials should not friend students on the internet. However, if a student tells them something, they must take it seriously. But they should not be monitoring students' phone conversations or texts. If something is brought to their attention, it is a different situation.

As a resident assistant, I do not friend my residents on the internet. I do not want to know about their private lives. I do not want to have to deal with their problems.

I think the war has lasted too long. 
The original goal was good - to bring democracy to a country without a fair government. 
But we have lost sight of this goal. 
Now, it seems we are fighting just to show our power. 

The reasons for the war were questionable from the start. 
George Bush's father had disagreements with Saddam Hussein in the past. 
If we wanted to give democracy to a country ruled by a dictator, that would be a fair reason for war. 
But personal reasons would not be fair. 

I think we made our point in the first few months of the war. 
Starting the war was a strong statement. 
But the war has lasted for many years. 
This is too long.

If we wanted to give democracy to a country ruled by a tyrant, that would be a good reason for war. 
But our reasons have changed over time. 
Now, it seems we are fighting just to fight. 
We do not want to end the war without winning. 

The war has lasted too long. 
Their government should take care of itself now. 
We have spent billions of dollars on this war. 
We have our own problems, like poverty and bad roads. 
We should spend our money on these problems. 

We are spending too much money on the war. 
We should use this money for things like health care and schools. 
Many of our citizens are dying in this war. 
We are losing the reason for fighting. 

I think that is my opinion.

I have a question. I was thinking about the fact that someone went online and saw something. This made a bad thing not happen. The person was on a website called Myspace. If you put information on the internet, it can be seen by many people. On Myspace, you need a friend to see someone's profile. But when you make someone a friend, you are giving them permission to see your information. So, if you put information on the internet, you should expect that many people will see it.

This is a difficult problem. If someone is watching students' profiles to prevent bad things, it's not fair to just look at certain students. But if someone sees something bad by chance, it's good that they can stop it. It depends on why they were looking at the profile.

I have a Facebook account, but not a Myspace one. I know there are bad people who can see things about me. I saw a story on TV about a man who got information easily from someone's profile. He contacted her on instant messenger and she met him. I would not do that. Some people in my classes know me without knowing my name on the internet. They can find out where I am and who my friends are. It's hard to keep my personal things private.

I limit what I put on the internet, but I also want to communicate with friends. I only accept friends I know. But I'm not sure who can see what.

My roommate told me about a school that banned Myspace. I don't know if this is a privacy issue. I don't know if the school had the right to tell students they couldn't have Myspace. That's my only other thought.

The Iraq War is a big problem. I want to talk about it. I feel strange saying I was against it from the start. Many people agree it was a bad idea. Most people in the United States, Iraq, and the world think so. 

According to polls, about 75 to 80 percent of people think the war was a bad idea. In Iraq, 80 percent of people agree. Even 70 percent of US troops in Iraq think it was a mistake. They think the US should leave within a year.

The situation in Iraq is very bad. It was a problem before the US entered. Now, pulling out of Iraq will be difficult too. There is a big cultural difference between the US and countries in the Middle East. The US thinks it can bring democracy to these countries. However, this is not what the people want. Saddam was a bad leader, but you must think carefully before invading a country.

I do not see a good reason for staying in Iraq. I have not heard a good reason to stay longer. If the US wants to leave slowly over time, I would not be against it. But I do not see a reason to stay.

I read that 80 percent of Iraqis want the US to leave within a year. Some Iraqis even want the US to leave now. These are the people we want to help. Maybe they know what is best for them. If we ask them and they say they want us to leave, then we cannot blame them if things get worse.

If we leave, we can say we tried to help. If we decide to help them after that, we will be seen as good people. Not really, but it will be better than now.

Gender discrimination is still a problem in the United States. It is not just for women. It also happens in the workplace. The field of work can make a difference. For example, in some jobs, people might think it is hard for a woman to be in charge. This is because society has a long history. In the past, women did not usually hold important positions.

In many places, people think it is strange for a man to stay at home and take care of the children. This is not always true. Some men want to be at home with their children. But society does not always accept this. People might think, "Men should work and earn money for their families." This can be hard for men who choose to stay at home.

In the fashion industry, men may not be taken seriously if they like fashion. Some people think men who like fashion are not typical. They might think, "How can a man know about fashion for women?" This is a problem because it is not true. Men can know a lot about fashion.

Change is slow. It takes time. But things are getting better. More women are becoming CEOs and getting important jobs. People are starting to accept this. It is also becoming more accepted for men to stay at home and take care of their children. 

We need to promote the qualities of people who are often discriminated against. We should show their good qualities without being too pushy. If we force people to accept change, they might resist. We have made progress, and change takes time.

People can be discriminated against based on their job, where they are from, or their gender. For example, someone from a farm might not have good grammar, but they might be very intelligent. They might work their way up to a CEO position. However, other men might think, "How can I know if you are smart if you don't speak well?"

In short, gender discrimination is still a problem in the United States. It affects women and men in different ways. It also affects people based on their job and where they are from.

My understanding is that they did not make marijuana a crime.  Instead, they made it a minor offense.  You can get a ticket for it, but you will not be arrested.  This is a change from the past when it was a serious crime.

Some people worry about the future problems that come with a marijuana charge, even if it is not a crime.  But there are two sides to this issue.  One side is that it costs a lot of money to arrest and try people for marijuana offenses.  This money could be used for other important things like education and helping the poor.

In some cities, people are against making marijuana legal because they do not want it to be easily available.  But in some places, like Denver, people are more open-minded.  They think making marijuana legal is a good idea because it can bring in money for important programs.

However, if marijuana were totally legal, it could be sold in stores like cigarettes.  This might lead to people smoking and driving, which is a problem.  Some people also think it would be uncomfortable to have marijuana out in the open.

Both marijuana and alcohol can cause problems.  Marijuana can affect people's lifestyles, and alcohol can affect their driving and decision-making.  Everyone reacts differently to substances, and some people have trouble controlling themselves.

I think it is hard to say what the effects of marijuana will be because people react differently.  But I do think that both marijuana and alcohol have their own problems.

I agree. 

Because I think some things the Catholic Church does are very old. 

They do the same things for a long time. 

This is good. Tradition helps keep us strong. 

But we also need to change with the times. 

Many Catholics go to Church every week. 

The Church is strict about rules. 

Sometimes I think the Church looks down on people who do not follow all the rules. 

The Church does not accept people who are not perfect Catholics. 

It also does not accept people from other religions. 

For example, my mom was from a different Christian group and my dad was from another one. 

They could not get married in the Catholic Church because of my dad's religion. 

This is not being tolerant of other religions. 

Catholics are taught to love others. 

But it is not fair to say we love others and then not accept them. 

So, I think some Catholic teachings and practices do not match. 

The Church is slow to change. 

I do not think allowing priests to marry would stop them from hurting children. 

Some people who hurt children will do so no matter what. 

It is not fair to compare a spouse to a child. 

These things will probably happen anyway. 

Therefore, I do not think allowing priests to marry would be a solution.

I am not sure about this issue. I don't know if one side is right or wrong. This is a very difficult problem we face now. It is hard to solve without hurting anyone's feelings. 

Marriage and church are two things that are very close together. But we cannot define marriage without offending people. It's hard to decide what marriage is. Should the government decide how to look at marriage? Some people think marriage is a special thing, like a sacrament. If you are married, you get special tax breaks. But if you were baptized, you still get the same tax breaks. 

So, if two people are married, the government should look at it as just a civil union. It's two people who are together. The government should not look at what kind of marriage it was. 

Gay marriage is another problem. Two people who love each other should be able to have a civil union. 

If all states can agree on this, they should make it a federal law. But changing the constitution to ban gay marriage is not a good idea. The constitution is very important. We should not change it for a small issue. 

Some people are very passionate about this issue. But it's not big enough to change the constitution. We should not change the constitution to ban gay marriage. 

No, I don't think so.

I was raised in a Christian home. This makes me think about homosexuality in a complex way. I have many gay friends. I don't agree with their lifestyle, but I think it should be legal. I don't think it's a national issue. Each state should make its own decision.

Some states are democratic and some are republican. Democratic states usually support gay marriage. If you live in a democratic state, you know how they feel about this issue. I think you should respect their decision if they choose to legalize gay marriage. You chose to live there, so you should accept their laws.

I think homosexuals should have the same rights as heterosexuals. This is why I think each state should be able to decide about gay marriage. I already said this, but I want to say it again. I don't think the president should decide for the whole country. President Bush is against gay marriage, but he can't decide for all states. This is because he doesn't live in every state.

I think some things should be decided by each state. If a president changes the law, it will just change back when another president is elected. The states will have to live with their decisions, not the president. If a president lifts the ban on gay marriage in some states, it will not be the same in other states.

I don't agree with President Bush's decision. I think each state should be able to make its own choice about gay marriage.

Myspace is a public place on the Internet. If you put something on it, everyone can see it. This includes school officials. You can't hide it even if you don't use your school name.

When you post on the Internet, people will see it. This includes school officials. They can see it from their homes. They may see things that students are not supposed to do. If they see something that can prevent a school shooting, they can take action.

I think school officials can see what students are doing on Myspace. If they see something bad, they can stop it. This is their responsibility. They want to make the school a safe place.

Schools have rules to protect students. They practice lock downs in case of emergency. This helps them be prepared for bad things that can happen.

School officials can look at Myspace to make sure students are safe. If they see something bad, they can stop it. This is good for everyone.

I don't think it's an invasion of privacy if they look at Myspace to keep students safe. If they see something bad, they can take action. This is their job.

When you write something, it can come back to you. This is why you should be careful what you say. If you say something bad, it can hurt you.

School officials can look at Myspace to make sure students are not doing bad things. If they see something, they can help. This is good for everyone.

In my opinion, school officials can look at Myspace to make the school a safer place. If they see something bad, they can stop it. This is their job.

I have mixed feelings about the war. At first, I wanted to help. I was affected by the 9/11 attacks. I thought we should go to their country and stop the bad things they did to us.

However, I think we did not think about the long-term effects. We did not prepare well and did not have a good plan. This may have led to problems.

Now, I am against the war. I do not think it helped. When countries fight each other, they cannot attack us. If they cannot work together, we cannot change them.

I do not care about what happens in their country. They fight a lot and cannot work together. This makes it hard for us to help them.

War is different in their country than in ours. They fight in a way that is not civilized. I do not think they want to make their country better. They just want us to leave.

I think we were not thinking clearly. We were looking for revenge, not for a good reason. President Bush wanted to declare war on Iraq. I understand why, but we did not have a good plan.

I think we should have helped them in a better way. We did not have unity and did not know what we were doing. A clear plan would have been helpful.

I do not think we can change their country. They will always be like that. We are not making enough progress. We have made some progress, but not enough to stay. If we leave, their country will probably collapse.

We are hurting ourselves by staying in their country. We cannot stay there forever. I think we should leave and let them solve their own problems.

The Catholic Church needs to change in some ways. Its views are old-fashioned on some things. Many people are losing interest in the Catholic Church because of this. 

The Catholic Church is against gay marriage, abortion, and birth control. These are important issues for many people. The Catholic Church has strong views on these things. But some people do not agree with these views.

If the Catholic Church changes its views, it may keep its followers. Some people do not want to be part of a church that does not agree with their ideas. The Catholic Church is against abortion. If you support abortion, you may not want to be part of a church that says it is wrong.

The same is true for gay marriage and other issues. If you disagree with the Catholic Church's views, you may not want to be part of the church. The Catholic Church does not allow women to be priests or for priests to be married. But this has not solved its problems.

The Catholic Church believes its priests are married to God. But people in other jobs have families and friends they care about. So, it is not clear why priests cannot have families too.

I think gay marriage is a good idea. I do not think it is wrong for two people of the same sex to get married. 

People are born gay. They are not born straight. I do not think it is right to make them feel bad about who they are. 

The federal government should not make laws about who can get married. It is not their business. It is up to the people to decide who they want to marry.

People should be free to love who they want. The government should not punish them for being gay. 

It is not a good idea for the federal government to get involved in people's personal lives. They should not try to control who people can love.

In the United States, people want freedom and equality. Everyone should be treated equally. Gay people should be able to get married and have the same rights as everyone else.

The federal government should not make laws that are not fair. They should respect people's rights and freedoms. Everyone should be free to love who they want, without fear of punishment.

I think gay marriage should be legal. 

There is no good reason it should not be. 

Some people think that gay couples are a threat to the traditional family. But this is not true. 

It's different. Similar to how two sides of a coin are different but equal. 

Gay couples have the same rights as straight couples. Like paying taxes and getting health care. 

But now, if you're in a gay couple, your partner can't visit you in the hospital or make decisions for you. 

This is not fair. Many studies show that gay couples have the same rates of success as straight couples. They have the same things that make a happy relationship. 

It's just a relationship. The same as any other. 

The problem is that people get hung up on the idea of marriage in a church. But gay couples are only asking for a marriage certificate from the government. 

If the government allows a civil union, why not a marriage? 

Separate but equal is not fair. 

Gay couples are the same in many ways. They have the same roles in a relationship. 

Some people worry about adoption and how it will affect the community. 

They also worry about children of gay couples. Will they be treated unfairly by their peers and other adults? 

In New York City, there are special schools for children of gay parents because they get bullied in regular schools. 

Parents protest to take the child out of school. 

This is not fair to the child. Parenting skills are the same for gay and straight couples. 

The government should help make gay marriage legal in all states. 

President Bush has strong views on this issue, based on his religion. But morality is different for everyone. 

The government should not make laws based on one group's morality. It's not fair to ignore the culture and morality of others. 

Many people are against gay marriage because they believe being gay is a choice or a defect. But this is not true. The American Psychological Association says so. 

We should listen to experts, not just what our friends and neighbors say.

I work in a hospital pharmacy during the summer. I know some people think that because a drug is against the law, it cannot be good. But I do not agree. 

If a drug is good for people, I think it should be available for them. However, making it available to the public is a different question. I do not think it should be available to everyone.

But, if a doctor says it can help someone, I think it should be used. Just because a drug is against the law does not mean it is bad. Many medicines are against the law, but doctors use them to help people. 

For example, oxycodone and Vicodin are against the law, but they are used in pharmacies because they are helpful. If people think marijuana is bad just because it is against the law, it is not fair. We should think about its good properties.

I do not think marijuana is like alcohol. If people drink too much alcohol, it can be bad for them. But if people use marijuana too much, it is not as bad. Maybe we should make marijuana legal, but not all at once. We should help people understand that it is not a bad thing.

People think marijuana is bad because it is against the law. But it is not as bad as heroin or cocaine. If we change the way people think about marijuana, they might use it responsibly. And it could be helpful for people who are sick.

I think the church has changed to fit modern times. It is not as strict as it was in the past. When I was a child, I went to church every Sunday. I wore a new dress and matching shoes and handbag. It was a special part of my life. I went to a private school, and I saw my friends on weekends. We would go to church together.

The church now has a shorter service on Sundays, only 30 minutes long. People dress more casually, especially in the summer. They wear beach clothes and sometimes arrive late. This makes the church feel more relaxed.

I also notice that people wear jeans and khaki pants to morning services. It's a big change from when I wore dresses and skirts. But it's not all bad – khaki pants are nice too.

I don't know much about the church's rules and politics. But I think the church has become more casual.

Regarding the problem of Catholic priests and child abuse, I don't think changing rules would have stopped it. Some men become pedophiles because of their genetics, not because of their choices. Even married men can become pedophiles. It's not because they are allowed to get married or not.

Some religions allow their priests to get married, like Seventh-day Adventists. But even in those cases, some men still become pedophiles. I think it's the person's choice, not their faith, that makes them a pedophile.

I think genetics play a big role in making people become pedophiles. It's not something they choose or learn. It's who they are. You can't change someone's genetics, even with a marriage.

If the church knew about the abuse and covered it up, that's wrong. But I don't think they always knew. If they did, they should have acted.

I don't have any other thoughts about the Catholic church.

The Iraq war is a very serious issue. I was not happy with the reason we went to war. The 9/11 attacks happened in September. Many people were still upset. I think the Bush administration used the Iraq war as an excuse. They said Saddam Hussein had weapons of mass destruction, but this was not true.

I think the Bush administration lied to the American people. They said Saddam Hussein was connected to Osama Bin Laden. But this was not true. Colin Powell, a high official, said he was not sure of the evidence when he presented it to the UN. This is very bad. It is against the law for a president to lie to the people.

I think the Bush administration does not respect the US Constitution. They have tried to make it weaker since 9/11. They wanted to go to war before they came into office. One of their officials wrote a book saying this. He said the younger Bush wanted to get rid of Saddam Hussein because his father was mad at him.

I think the war has gone on too long. If we leave now, many more people will die. The country may fall into civil war. The UN and the US are trying to find a new way. They want other countries in the area to help restore order. But I am not sure this is a good idea. Iraq will have trouble being a free country if other countries control it.

The government in Iraq is not working well. The Parliament is not effective. The Prime Minister does not have control. Radical groups are fighting for power. It is hard to make decisions. I do not know what the solution is.

I have some thoughts about the war in Iraq. I am not sure it is a good idea. It was not declared as a war by the US Congress. It seems like we went to war mainly because of the 9/11 attacks. 

I do not know a lot about the war. I think we are trying to build democracy in Iraq. We also want their oil. But I do not think that is a good reason to stay there. It is causing problems for the people of Iraq. 

If we stay in Iraq, we will have to try to build democracy. This takes a long time. If we leave, the Iraqis will be angry with us. They will have to start over again.

I am not sure what to think. I think the war should not be called a war anymore. It was not declared as a war, so it is not a real war. I think we are in Iraq to show our power and to get their oil. 

This is a problem. We are wasting our resources. The person in charge, President Bush, is looking bad because of the war. It is like the Vietnam War, which was also not declared as a war and was not successful.

I know people who have family members in Iraq. Some of these family members are fighting in the war. I want the war to end because many people are suffering. But I also think that if we stay, we will try to change the culture of Iraq. This could make things worse. The people of Iraq will be angry with us, and we will make the Al-Kaida group stronger. 

I think this war will last for a long time. We will have to think carefully about what to do.

I don't think it's right for a state to make a law about something that is against a church's rules. The constitution says there must be a separation of church and state. This means the government should not control what churches do. It's very clear in the constitution.

If the government tries to make a law about this, it would go against what is already written in the constitution. This is not right. It would be like the government saying, "We don't like your church's rules, so we will make a new law to stop you."

Some people want to make a law against this, but I think that's not fair. They are choosing one church's rules over another. Many Catholics and Christians do not support this. They think it's not right for the government to tell churches what to do.

Separation of church and state is very important in the United States. It allows for freedom of religion. If the government makes a law about this, it would be wrong. It would be against what is already written in the constitution.

I don't think the government should be involved in this issue. The president is trying to make a law because of his own personal beliefs. He is showing that he prefers one religion over others. This is not fair.

There is no good reason for a law against this. It won't help the economy, and it might even make things better for society. The churches should decide what is right and wrong, not the government.

I think I have said everything I want to say.

The war in Iraq was a difficult and complicated issue. I think the US government was not honest with the American people about the reasons for the war. Before the invasion, I believe the government tried to connect the war in Iraq to the terrorist attacks on September 11, 2001. However, this connection was not clear.

I am against war, especially a preemptive strike. The war in Iraq was similar to the Vietnam War. The US government did not learn from past mistakes. Many American soldiers died in the war. The US removed the Iraqi government, but the government was not prepared for the consequences. 

The aftermath of the war was chaotic and violent. The US tried to put a democratic government in Iraq, but this was not an easy task. It took years to implement a new form of government. In the US, it took a long time to establish a strong democracy.

The US government should have been more careful and prepared before invading Iraq. They should have thought about all possible outcomes. The government was not honest with the American people about the war. They made the war seem like a quick and easy victory.

The US government should not have gone to war without a clear plan. Many American troops are still dying in Iraq. The US is trying to train the Iraqi military and police to control their country. This is a long and difficult process.

The government made it seem like the war would be a short and successful stay in Iraq. However, this was not true. Implementing a new form of government takes a long time. It was not an easy thing to do in the US, and it will not be easy in Iraq.

The war in Iraq was a difficult decision. I had mixed feelings about it. In the 2004 presidential election, one of my reasons for voting for George Bush was to let him finish what he started. However, I now think that the US should try to leave Iraq, but it is hard because the US took away their government and way of life.

The US should consider the many American casualties and whether it is worth risking more lives for a free democratic Iraq. If we are invading Iraq to make it a democracy, why not help other countries? The main reason is oil. The US wants to control the oil in Iraq. Another reason for the war was that Iraq had weapons of mass destruction, but none were found.

In conclusion, I hope the war in Iraq ends soon and there will be peace. But I do not think this will happen soon.

I support gay marriage. I have always supported it. It is a personal preference. Some people think it may be caused by biology, not by how we are raised. This means we should not give people fewer rights because of something they cannot control.

I think it is wrong to deny people rights because of their personal life. People who love each other should be able to get married. This is not just a state or government issue, it is a personal issue.

In my neighborhood, there are gay couples who are not married because they are not allowed to be. But they live like any other family. They walk their dogs like everyone else. I think it is not right for the government to decide what marriage is.

Research shows that being gay may be caused by something in the brain. People may be born this way. It is not because of how they are raised or their family.

Marriage is a personal thing. If two people want to get married, they should be able to do it quietly, like anyone else. But if gay people want to get married, it becomes a big issue. This is not right. Marriage should be a private matter, not a public one.

I do not think the government should decide who can get married and who cannot. This is a personal choice.

When you put something on the internet, it is public. Anyone can see it. If you post something online, it is like writing it on a piece of paper and giving it to the whole world.

As a resident assistant, I have seen this happen before. When you put something on the internet, it can affect how people think about you. It is not private information. If you do not want people to see it, do not put it online.

If you talk about hurting someone or doing something bad, people will take it seriously. The school must take action if they learn about it. They cannot ignore it, or something bad might happen.

But, some people joke or make mistakes on the internet. It can be hard to know what to believe. Recently, something happened at our school. Someone overheard a student talking about something and told the school. The school looked at the student's Facebook page and found some things that were not good. They looked serious because of the situation.

When you put something on the internet, you cannot control who sees it. If you do not want people to know something, do not post it online. You cannot tell people what to think or what to take seriously.

School officials should not friend students on the internet. However, if a student tells them something, they must take it seriously. But they should not be monitoring students' phone conversations or texts. If something is brought to their attention, it is a different situation.

As a resident assistant, I do not friend my residents on the internet. I do not want to know about their private lives. I do not want to have to deal with their problems.

I think the war has lasted too long. 
The original goal was good - to bring democracy to a country without a fair government. 
But we have lost sight of this goal. 
Now, it seems we are fighting just to show our power. 

The reasons for the war were questionable from the start. 
George Bush's father had disagreements with Saddam Hussein in the past. 
If we wanted to give democracy to a country ruled by a dictator, that would be a fair reason for war. 
But personal reasons would not be fair. 

I think we made our point in the first few months of the war. 
Starting the war was a strong statement. 
But the war has lasted for many years. 
This is too long.

If we wanted to give democracy to a country ruled by a tyrant, that would be a good reason for war. 
But our reasons have changed over time. 
Now, it seems we are fighting just to fight. 
We do not want to end the war without winning. 

The war has lasted too long. 
Their government should take care of itself now. 
We have spent billions of dollars on this war. 
We have our own problems, like poverty and bad roads. 
We should spend our money on these problems. 

We are spending too much money on the war. 
We should use this money for things like health care and schools. 
Many of our citizens are dying in this war. 
We are losing the reason for fighting. 

I think that is my opinion.

I have a question. I was thinking about the fact that someone went online and saw something. This made a bad thing not happen. The person was on a website called Myspace. If you put information on the internet, it can be seen by many people. On Myspace, you need a friend to see someone's profile. But when you make someone a friend, you are giving them permission to see your information. So, if you put information on the internet, you should expect that many people will see it.

This is a difficult problem. If someone is watching students' profiles to prevent bad things, it's not fair to just look at certain students. But if someone sees something bad by chance, it's good that they can stop it. It depends on why they were looking at the profile.

I have a Facebook account, but not a Myspace one. I know there are bad people who can see things about me. I saw a story on TV about a man who got information easily from someone's profile. He contacted her on instant messenger and she met him. I would not do that. Some people in my classes know me without knowing my name on the internet. They can find out where I am and who my friends are. It's hard to keep my personal things private.

I limit what I put on the internet, but I also want to communicate with friends. I only accept friends I know. But I'm not sure who can see what.

My roommate told me about a school that banned Myspace. I don't know if this is a privacy issue. I don't know if the school had the right to tell students they couldn't have Myspace. That's my only other thought.

The Iraq War is a big problem. I want to talk about it. I feel strange saying I was against it from the start. Many people agree it was a bad idea. Most people in the United States, Iraq, and the world think so. 

According to polls, about 75 to 80 percent of people think the war was a bad idea. In Iraq, 80 percent of people agree. Even 70 percent of US troops in Iraq think it was a mistake. They think the US should leave within a year.

The situation in Iraq is very bad. It was a problem before the US entered. Now, pulling out of Iraq will be difficult too. There is a big cultural difference between the US and countries in the Middle East. The US thinks it can bring democracy to these countries. However, this is not what the people want. Saddam was a bad leader, but you must think carefully before invading a country.

I do not see a good reason for staying in Iraq. I have not heard a good reason to stay longer. If the US wants to leave slowly over time, I would not be against it. But I do not see a reason to stay.

I read that 80 percent of Iraqis want the US to leave within a year. Some Iraqis even want the US to leave now. These are the people we want to help. Maybe they know what is best for them. If we ask them and they say they want us to leave, then we cannot blame them if things get worse.

If we leave, we can say we tried to help. If we decide to help them after that, we will be seen as good people. Not really, but it will be better than now.

Gender discrimination is still a problem in the United States. It is not just for women. It also happens in the workplace. The field of work can make a difference. For example, in some jobs, people might think it is hard for a woman to be in charge. This is because society has a long history. In the past, women did not usually hold important positions.

In many places, people think it is strange for a man to stay at home and take care of the children. This is not always true. Some men want to be at home with their children. But society does not always accept this. People might think, "Men should work and earn money for their families." This can be hard for men who choose to stay at home.

In the fashion industry, men may not be taken seriously if they like fashion. Some people think men who like fashion are not typical. They might think, "How can a man know about fashion for women?" This is a problem because it is not true. Men can know a lot about fashion.

Change is slow. It takes time. But things are getting better. More women are becoming CEOs and getting important jobs. People are starting to accept this. It is also becoming more accepted for men to stay at home and take care of their children. 

We need to promote the qualities of people who are often discriminated against. We should show their good qualities without being too pushy. If we force people to accept change, they might resist. We have made progress, and change takes time.

People can be discriminated against based on their job, where they are from, or their gender. For example, someone from a farm might not have good grammar, but they might be very intelligent. They might work their way up to a CEO position. However, other men might think, "How can I know if you are smart if you don't speak well?"

In short, gender discrimination is still a problem in the United States. It affects women and men in different ways. It also affects people based on their job and where they are from.

My understanding is that they did not make marijuana a crime.  Instead, they made it a minor offense.  You can get a ticket for it, but you will not be arrested.  This is a change from the past when it was a serious crime.

Some people worry about the future problems that come with a marijuana charge, even if it is not a crime.  But there are two sides to this issue.  One side is that it costs a lot of money to arrest and try people for marijuana offenses.  This money could be used for other important things like education and helping the poor.

In some cities, people are against making marijuana legal because they do not want it to be easily available.  But in some places, like Denver, people are more open-minded.  They think making marijuana legal is a good idea because it can bring in money for important programs.

However, if marijuana were totally legal, it could be sold in stores like cigarettes.  This might lead to people smoking and driving, which is a problem.  Some people also think it would be uncomfortable to have marijuana out in the open.

Both marijuana and alcohol can cause problems.  Marijuana can affect people's lifestyles, and alcohol can affect their driving and decision-making.  Everyone reacts differently to substances, and some people have trouble controlling themselves.

I think it is hard to say what the effects of marijuana will be because people react differently.  But I do think that both marijuana and alcohol have their own problems.

I agree. 

Because I think some things the Catholic Church does are very old. 

They do the same things for a long time. 

This is good. Tradition helps keep us strong. 

But we also need to change with the times. 

Many Catholics go to Church every week. 

The Church is strict about rules. 

Sometimes I think the Church looks down on people who do not follow all the rules. 

The Church does not accept people who are not perfect Catholics. 

It also does not accept people from other religions. 

For example, my mom was from a different Christian group and my dad was from another one. 

They could not get married in the Catholic Church because of my dad's religion. 

This is not being tolerant of other religions. 

Catholics are taught to love others. 

But it is not fair to say we love others and then not accept them. 

So, I think some Catholic teachings and practices do not match. 

The Church is slow to change. 

I do not think allowing priests to marry would stop them from hurting children. 

Some people who hurt children will do so no matter what. 

It is not fair to compare a spouse to a child. 

These things will probably happen anyway. 

Therefore, I do not think allowing priests to marry would be a solution.

I am not sure about this issue. I don't know if one side is right or wrong. This is a very difficult problem we face now. It is hard to solve without hurting anyone's feelings. 

Marriage and church are two things that are very close together. But we cannot define marriage without offending people. It's hard to decide what marriage is. Should the government decide how to look at marriage? Some people think marriage is a special thing, like a sacrament. If you are married, you get special tax breaks. But if you were baptized, you still get the same tax breaks. 

So, if two people are married, the government should look at it as just a civil union. It's two people who are together. The government should not look at what kind of marriage it was. 

Gay marriage is another problem. Two people who love each other should be able to have a civil union. 

If all states can agree on this, they should make it a federal law. But changing the constitution to ban gay marriage is not a good idea. The constitution is very important. We should not change it for a small issue. 

Some people are very passionate about this issue. But it's not big enough to change the constitution. We should not change the constitution to ban gay marriage. 

No, I don't think so.

I was raised in a Christian home. This makes me think about homosexuality in a complex way. I have many gay friends. I don't agree with their lifestyle, but I think it should be legal. I don't think it's a national issue. Each state should make its own decision.

Some states are democratic and some are republican. Democratic states usually support gay marriage. If you live in a democratic state, you know how they feel about this issue. I think you should respect their decision if they choose to legalize gay marriage. You chose to live there, so you should accept their laws.

I think homosexuals should have the same rights as heterosexuals. This is why I think each state should be able to decide about gay marriage. I already said this, but I want to say it again. I don't think the president should decide for the whole country. President Bush is against gay marriage, but he can't decide for all states. This is because he doesn't live in every state.

I think some things should be decided by each state. If a president changes the law, it will just change back when another president is elected. The states will have to live with their decisions, not the president. If a president lifts the ban on gay marriage in some states, it will not be the same in other states.

I don't agree with President Bush's decision. I think each state should be able to make its own choice about gay marriage.

Myspace is a public place on the Internet. If you put something on it, everyone can see it. This includes school officials. You can't hide it even if you don't use your school name.

When you post on the Internet, people will see it. This includes school officials. They can see it from their homes. They may see things that students are not supposed to do. If they see something that can prevent a school shooting, they can take action.

I think school officials can see what students are doing on Myspace. If they see something bad, they can stop it. This is their responsibility. They want to make the school a safe place.

Schools have rules to protect students. They practice lock downs in case of emergency. This helps them be prepared for bad things that can happen.

School officials can look at Myspace to make sure students are safe. If they see something bad, they can stop it. This is good for everyone.

I don't think it's an invasion of privacy if they look at Myspace to keep students safe. If they see something bad, they can take action. This is their job.

When you write something, it can come back to you. This is why you should be careful what you say. If you say something bad, it can hurt you.

School officials can look at Myspace to make sure students are not doing bad things. If they see something, they can help. This is good for everyone.

In my opinion, school officials can look at Myspace to make the school a safer place. If they see something bad, they can stop it. This is their job.

I have mixed feelings about the war. At first, I wanted to help. I was affected by the 9/11 attacks. I thought we should go to their country and stop the bad things they did to us.

However, I think we did not think about the long-term effects. We did not prepare well and did not have a good plan. This may have led to problems.

Now, I am against the war. I do not think it helped. When countries fight each other, they cannot attack us. If they cannot work together, we cannot change them.

I do not care about what happens in their country. They fight a lot and cannot work together. This makes it hard for us to help them.

War is different in their country than in ours. They fight in a way that is not civilized. I do not think they want to make their country better. They just want us to leave.

I think we were not thinking clearly. We were looking for revenge, not for a good reason. President Bush wanted to declare war on Iraq. I understand why, but we did not have a good plan.

I think we should have helped them in a better way. We did not have unity and did not know what we were doing. A clear plan would have been helpful.

I do not think we can change their country. They will always be like that. We are not making enough progress. We have made some progress, but not enough to stay. If we leave, their country will probably collapse.

We are hurting ourselves by staying in their country. We cannot stay there forever. I think we should leave and let them solve their own problems.
